page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ME
page.content: Cont: We rush out into the playground to play soccer, or skipping (mostly girls). When the whistle is blown we line up again, then walk into School. Between 11 oclock and 12 oclock we do language work and study English. Some -times I work from a book called "Bet -ter English Book Four". I enjoy my School dinner because eating is my favourite occupation. At 1:15p.m. we come in from the lunch break. Mr Allen tells us what we are going to do for the rest of the day. After the after -noon break we often have P.E. I enjoy athletics. On many days Mr Allen will read us a story or part of one. My sch -ool day ends at 3:40p.m. when I catch the taxi back to Purston. When I get home I like to watch T.V. At 5:00p.m. my dad comes in. I like to have a bath at the end of the day. I go to bed at about 9:00p.m.
